name: Linken's Sphere
description: This magical sphere once protected one of the most famous heroes in history.

abilities.name: Spellblock
abilities.description: Blocks and completely negates most single-target abilities targeted at the wielder.
notes: Does not block abilities cast by allies.
For a list of blocked abilities and their interactions, see Spell Block page.
If stacked, Spell Block triggers in priority order: Counterspell → Counterspell Ally → Transfer Spellblock → Spellblock

abilities.name: Transfer Spellblock
abilities.description: Temporarily transfers the effects of Spellblock to the targeted allied hero.
notes: The duration of the transfer matches the current cooldown of the item. Cooldown reductions are considered. However, resetting the item cooldown does not prematurely end the transfer.
Puts Spellblock on cooldown when transferred to an ally. If the transferred Spell Block gets triggered, the item goes on cooldown again.
Can be cast on allied heroes, Clones, and Creep-Heroes.
Can be cast on Illusions, but it does not block abilities for them.
Successive casts on the same target refresh the duration, the buff does not stack.

additionalInfo: This item is shown as a Team Item in the shop window when purchased by an ally.
The item's attributes grant the following additional stats:
192 mana, 0.8 mana regeneration and 1.6% flat base magic resistance.
16 main attack damage to all Strength/Agility/Intelligence heroes.
21.6 main attack damage to universal heroes.
